begin AB_BatControl_s

Short DoOnce

if ( DoOnce == 0 )
	SetSpeed 500
	set DoOnce to 1
endif

End

Begin AB_Bellows_s
; Script for constantly activated forge bellows

Short state
Float timer

If ( CellChanged )
	Return
Elseif ( MenuMode )
	Return
Endif

If ( OnActivate )
	Set state to 1
Endif

If ( state == 0 )
	Return
Elseif ( state == 1 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 3 0
	PlayLoopSound3DVP AB_Bellows 1.0 1.0
	Set timer to 0
	Set state to 2
Elseif ( state == 2 )
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	If ( timer < 15.5 ) ; ~4 cycles - ( 1 + 3 repeats in LoopGroup )
		Return
	Endif
	StopSound AB_Bellows
;	PlayGroup Idle 2
	Set state to 0
Endif

End

Begin AB_DayActivate_s

short toEnable

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
        return
endif

set toEnable to 0

if ( GameHour > 6 )
	if ( GameHour < 18 )
		set toEnable to 1
	endif
endif

if ( toEnable == 1)
	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		Enable
	endif
else
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
endif

End

Begin AB_DwrvGrateStairsEXAMPLE_s

Short state
Float timer

; Idle = Raised
; Idle2 = Lowering
; Idle3 = Lowered
; Idle4 = Raising

if ( CellChanged )
	set state to 0
	set timer to 0
	PlayGroup Idle
endif

if ( state == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance Player <= 500 )
		LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
		PlaySound "AB_DwMetalSlideClose", 1.0, 1.0
		set timer to 20
		set state to 1
	endif
elseif ( state == 1 )
	set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	PlayGroup Idle3
	if ( timer <= 0 )
		LoopGroup Idle4 0 1
		PlaySound "AB_DwMetalSlideClose", 1.0, 1.0
		set state to 2
		set timer to 5
	endif
elseif ( state == 2 )
	set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	if ( timer <= 0 )
		set state to 0
	endif
endif


End

begin AB_EnchantingTable_s

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

if ( ScriptRunning AB_OpenEnchantMenu_s )
    return
endif

if ( OnActivate )
    StartScript AB_OpenEnchantMenu_s
    Activate
endif

end

begin AB_Furn_DwrvCrankEX_s

float counter
short doOnce

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	Set counter to 1
endif

if ( counter == 0 )
	return
endif

if ( doOnce == 2 ) 
	MessageBox "The crank seems to be stuck."
	Set counter to 0
	return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	PlaySound "Door Stone Open"
	set doOnce to 1
endif

Set counter to counter + GetSecondsPassed

; turn while doing stuff

Rotate X 80

;do stuff while counter is running

"AB_Furn_DwrvLeverEX"->MoveWorld Y 80

if ( counter > 6 )
	Set doOnce to 2
	Set counter to 0
endif

end

begin AB_Furn_DwrvLeverEXAMPLE_s

short state		;the state of the lever, 0 down, 1 up
short move
short doonce

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( doonce == 1 )
		MessageBox "The lever does not move anymore."
	else
		set move to 1
		set doonce to 1
	endif
endif

if  ( move == 1 )
	
	;animate the lever
	if ( state == 0 )
			playgroup "idle2"
			set state to 1
	else
			playgroup "idle3"
			set state to 0
	endif

	set move to 0

endif

end

Begin AB_GrinderMisc_s

If ( MenuMode )
	Return
Elseif ( GetDisabled )
	SetDelete 1
Endif

If ( Player->GetItemCount AB_Rep_GrinderWheel < 1 )
	Disable
Endif

End

Begin AB_GrinderWheel_s

Short ActionFlag
Float Timer

If ( MenuMode )
	Return
Endif

If ( OnActivate )
	If ( ActionFlag == 0 )
		If ( Player->GetItemCount AB_Rep_GrinderWheel < 1 )
			Player->AddItem AB_Rep_GrinderWheel 1
		Endif
		Set ActionFlag to 1
	Endif
Endif

If ( ActionFlag == 1 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 5 0
	Player->Equip AB_Rep_GrinderWheel
	Set ActionFlag to 2
Elseif ( ActionFlag == 2 )
	If ( GetSoundPlaying "AB_GrindStone" == 0 )
		PlayLoopSound3DVP "AB_GrindStone" 1.0 1.0
	Endif
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	If ( timer < 6.0 )
		Return
	Endif
	Set timer to 0
	PlayGroup Idle 0
	Set ActionFlag to 0
Elseif ( Player->GetItemCount AB_Rep_GrinderWheel > 0 )
	Player->RemoveItem AB_Rep_GrinderWheel 1
Endif

If ( GetSoundPlaying "AB_GrindStone" )
	StopSound "AB_GrindStone"
Endif

End

Begin AB_ImpChainPullEXAMPLE_s

short state
short closeSound
float timer

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( CellChanged )
	set state to 0
	PlayGroup Idle
	"AB_Furn_DngGrateEXAMPLE"->SetAtStart
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
	"AB_Furn_DngGrateEXAMPLE"->MoveWorld Z 40
	if ( timer < 0 )
		set state to 2
		set timer to 5
	endif
	Return
elseif ( state == 2 )
	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
	if ( timer < 0 )
		set state to 3
		PlaySound "Open Lock"
		PlaySound "MournGates"
		PlaySound "Stone Door Open 1"
		set timer to 5
	endif
	Return
elseif ( state == 3 )
	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
	"AB_Furn_DngGrateEXAMPLE"->MoveWorld Z -40
	LoopGroup Idle3 0 1
	if ( closeSound == 0 )
		if ( timer < 1.5 )
			PlaySound "MournGatesClose"
			set closeSound to 1
		endif
		Return
	elseif ( timer < 0 )
		set state to 0
		set closeSound to 0
		set timer to 0
	endif
	Return
elseif ( state == 0 )
	PlayGroup Idle
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( state != 0 )
		Return
	else
		LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
		PlaySound "Open Lock"
		PlaySound "MournGates"
		PlaySound "Stone Door Open 1"
		set state to 1
		set timer to 5
		Activate
	endif
endif


End

begin AB_ImpHiddenDoor_s

float timer
float angle

short opened

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

if ( timer < 0 )
    ; opening/closing is in progress
    set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
    if ( opened )
        Rotate X -90
    else
        Rotate X 90
    endif
    return
endif

if ( OnActivate )
    ; start the opening/closing process
    PlaySound3D "Stone Door Open 1"
    set opened to 1 - opened
    set timer to -1
    Activate
    ; calculate the desired final angle
    set angle to ( GetAngle X - ( 180 * opened ) + 90 )
    return
endif

SetAngle X angle

end

begin AB_ImpHiddenTrapDoor_s

float timer
short On

DontSaveObject

if (CellChanged == 1)
	SetatStart
	set On to 0
endif

if (MenuMode == 0)

	if (GetStandingPC == 1)

		if (On == 0)
			set timer to 0
			set On to 1
			PlaySound3D, "Stone Door Open 1"
			DisablePlayerControls
		endif

	endif

	if (On == 1)

		set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

		if (timer < 1)
			rotate x, -88

		elseif (timer >= 1)
			set timer to 0
			EnablePlayerControls
			set On to 2

		endif

	elseif (On == 2)

		set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

		if (timer < 5)
			return

		elseif (timer >= 5)
			set timer to 0
			set On to 3
			PlaySound3D, "Stone Door Open 1"

		endif

	elseif (On == 3)

		set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

		if (timer < 1)
			rotate x, 88

		elseif (timer >= 1)
			SetatStart
			set On to 0

		endif

	endif

endif

end

begin AB_KwamaAcidPool_s

short doOnce
short PotionDuration
float TimeStampNow

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	set PotionDuration to 20
	set doOnce to 1
endif

if ( CellChanged )
    if ( GetSoundPlaying "oil bubbly" == 0 )
        PlayLoopSound3DVP "oil bubbly" 1.0 1.0
    endif
endif

if ( GetStandingPC )
    set TimeStampNow to ( DaysPassed * 24 + GameHour )
    if ( TimeStampNow > AB_KwamaAcidPoolExpiration )
        set AB_KwamaAcidPoolExpiration to ( TimeStampNow + PotionDuration / 3600.0 * TimeScale )
        Player->Equip AB_eff_KwamaPoison
    endif
endif

end

begin AB_KwamaEffect_s

short splatWasTriggered
float timer
float dx
float dy
float dz
float dist

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )


;# give player some time to clear out
if ( timer < 1.5 )
  	return
endif

  
if ( splatWasTriggered )
	if ( timer > 5 )
  		SetDelete 1
    elseif ( GetDisabled )
	elseif ( timer >= 3 )
  		Disable
    endif
  	return
endif


set splatWasTriggered to 1

;# give player a chance to resist
if ( Player->GetResistDisease >= Random100 )
  	return
endif
  

;# player must be below on Z axis
set dz to ( player->GetPos Z )
if ( dz >= GetPos Z )
    return
endif


;# player must be within 100 units on X/Y axis
set dx to ( Player->GetPos X )
set dy to ( Player->GetPos Y )
set dx to ( dx - ( GetPos X ) )
set dy to ( dy - ( GetPos Y ) )
set dist to ( dx * dx + dy * dy )
set dist to GetSquareRoot dist
if ( dist >= 100 )
  	return
endif


;# all requirements statisfied, trigger the splat
PlaySound "AB_Splat"
player->AddSpell "droops"


end

Begin AB_KwamaEggBlighted_s

Short ran
Short pcBlightResist

if ( OnActivate )
	set pcBlightResist to ( Player->GetResistBlight )
	set ran to random100
	set ran to ( ran + 0.3 * pcBlightResist )
	if ( ran < 30 )
		Player->AddSpell "ash-chancre"
		Activate
	else
		Activate
	endif
endif


End

begin AB_KwamaEggBomb_s

float timer
short looted
short explode

; don't explode if kwama egg already looted
if ( GetItemCount AB_lvl_KwamaEgg )
elseif ( GetItemCount food_kwama_egg_02 )
else
	if ( looted == 0 )
		PlayGroup death2 1
		set looted to 1
		return
	else
		return
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

; do not let the player loot the egg if it has exploded or already been looted
if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( explode > 0 )
		Return
	elseif ( looted == 1 )
		Return
	else
		Activate
		PlaySound "AB_SlimyTouch"
	endif
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
    set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
    return
endif

; play anim when explosion triggered
if ( explode == 1 )
	PlayGroup death1 1
	set explode to 2
	if ( GetDistance player < 64 )
		Player->Equip AB_eff_KwamaPoison
	endif
endif

; don't continue if we have exploded
if ( explode == 2 )
	Return
endif

; don't explode if player is too far away
if ( GetDistance player >= 150 )
    return
endif

; don't explode if player passes sneak check
if ( GetPCSneaking )
	if ( player->GetSneak > Random100 )
		set timer to 4
		return
	endif
endif

; must be touch range spells
PlaySound "scrib roar"
PlaySound "kwamaF left"
set explode to 1
set timer to 1

end

Begin AB_KwamaForagerPeek_s

Short reset
Float timer

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( CellChanged )
	if ( reset )
		set reset to 0
	endif
endif

if ( GetDistance "player" >= 1024 )
	if ( reset )
		set reset to 0
	endif
endif

if ( reset )
	LoopGroup Idle 1
	return
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
	return
endif

if ( GetDistance "player" > 600 )
	return
endif

if ( Random100 < 50 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 1 1
	set timer to 20
	set reset to 1
else
	set timer to 5
endif


End

Begin AB_KwamaForagerStorage_s

float timer
short puking


DontSaveObject


if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif


if ( timer > 0 )
    set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
    return
endif


if ( puking )
    ; was previously puking, stop
    ; MessageBox "STOP PUKING - LoopGroup Idle"
    LoopGroup Idle 2 1
    set puking to 0
    set timer to 8
    return
endif


if ( GetDistance "player" > 500 )
    return
endif


; was not puking, roll to start
set puking to Random 2
if ( puking )
	; MessageBox "PUKE ROLL=FAIL - Idle2 1"
	LoopGroup Idle2 1 1
	PlaceAtMe "AB_Fx_KwamaPuke" 1 0 0
	set timer to 2
else
	; MessageBox "PUKE ROLL=PASS - Idle"
	LoopGroup Idle 1 1
	set timer to 4
endif


end

begin AB_LightSourceDay_s

short Xposition
short myState

dontsaveobject

if ( CellChanged == 1 )

	if ( Xposition > 4520 )

		set myState to 1
	else
		set myState to 0
	endif
	Return
endif

If ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
Endif

set Xposition to ( GetPos, x )

if ( Gamehour > 21 )

	if ( Xposition < 5420 )
		SetPos x 5420
		MoveWorld x 1
	endif
	return

elseif ( Gamehour > 20 )

	if ( Xposition < 5420 )
		MoveWorld x, 10
	endif
	return
endif

if ( getcurrentweather < 2 )

	if ( Gamehour > 7 )

		if ( Xposition > 4420 )
			SetPos x 4420
			MoveWorld x -1

		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			disable
			enable
		endif

	elseif ( Gamehour > 6 )

		if ( Xposition > 4420 )
			MoveWorld x, -10

		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			disable
			enable
		endif

	elseif ( Xposition < 5420 )
		SetPos x 5420
		MoveWorld x 1
	endif
	return
endif

if ( getcurrentweather < 5 )

	if ( Gamehour > 7 )

		if ( Xposition > 4520 )
			SetPos x 4520
			MoveWorld x -1
		elseif ( Xposition < 4510 )
			SetPos x 4520
			MoveWorld x -1

		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			disable
			enable
		endif

	elseif ( Gamehour > 6 )

		if ( Xposition > 4520 )
			MoveWorld x, -10
		elseif ( Xposition < 4510 )
			SetPos x 4520
			MoveWorld x -1

		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			disable
			enable
		endif

	elseif ( Xposition < 5420 )
		SetPos x 5420
		MoveWorld x 1
	endif
	return
endif

if ( Xposition < 5420 )
	SetPos x 5420
	MoveWorld x 1
endif

end

begin AB_OpenEnchantMenu_s

short state

if ( state == 0 )
    ; add temp enchant bonus
	if ( AB_EnchantBonus == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetSpell "AB_ab_EnchantBonus" == 0 )
			Player->AddSpell "AB_ab_EnchantBonus"
			return
		endif
	elseif ( AB_EnchantBonus == 1 )
		if ( Player->GetSpell "AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp" == 0 )
			Player->AddSpell "AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp"
			return
		endif
	endif
    ; try to equip a soulgem
    if ( Player->GetItemCount "Misc_Soulgem_Petty" )
        Player->Equip "Misc_Soulgem_Petty"
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount "Misc_Soulgem_Lesser" )
        Player->Equip "Misc_Soulgem_Lesser"
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount "Misc_Soulgem_Common" )
        Player->Equip "Misc_Soulgem_Common"
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount "Misc_Soulgem_Greater" )
        Player->Equip "Misc_Soulgem_Greater"
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount "Misc_Soulgem_Grand" )
        Player->Equip "Misc_Soulgem_Grand"
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount "Misc_Soulgem_Azura" )
        Player->Equip "Misc_Soulgem_Azura"
    endif
    set state to 1
    return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
    ; check if equipping worked
    MessageBox " "
    MessageBox " "
    if ( MenuMode )
        MessageBox "Your enchantments will be more potent while using an enchanting table."
        set state to 2
    else
        MessageBox "You don't have any filled soulgems."
        set state to 3
    endif
    return
endif

if ( state == 2 )
    ; wait until done enchanting
    if ( MenuMode == 0 )
        set state to 3
    endif
    return
endif

if ( state == 3 )
    ; remove buff and stopscript
    if ( Player->GetSpell "AB_ab_EnchantBonus" )
        Player->RemoveSpell AB_ab_EnchantBonus
    elseif ( Player->GetSpell "AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp" )
        Player->RemoveSpell AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp
    else
        StopScript AB_OpenEnchantMenu_s
        set state to 0
    endif
    return
endif

end

begin AB_PurseCoin_s

short OnPCEquip

if ( OnPCEquip )
    set OnPCEquip to 0
    StartScript AB_PurseCoinGlobal_s
endif

end

Begin AB_PurseCoinGlobal_s

short gold

set gold to Random 100
MessageBox "%g Gold Added" gold
Player->PlaySound "Item Gold Up"
Player->RemoveItem "AB_Misc_PurseCoin" 1

while ( gold >= 20 )
    Player->AddItem "Gold_001" 20
    set gold to ( gold - 20 )
endwhile
while ( gold >= 5 )
    Player->AddItem "Gold_001" 5
    set gold to ( gold - 5 )
endwhile
while ( gold >= 1 )
    Player->AddItem "Gold_001" 1
    set gold to ( gold - 1 )
endwhile

StopScript AB_PurseCoinGlobal_s

end

Begin AB_ShrineAlma_s


;Cure Common Disease [and Cure Common Disease Other] do not currently work through scripts; reported as a bug
short button
short donation
short QuestionState

if ( menumode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	if ( QuestionState == 0 )
		Return
	endif
endif

;set donation amount
if ( player->GetPCRank "Temple" >= 2 )			;member of rank 2 or above
	Set donation to 0
elseif ( player->GetPCRank "Temple" >= 0 )		;member below rank 2
	Set donation to 5
else																;not a member
	Set donation to 35
endif

if ( Player->GetItemCount Gold_001 < donation )
	MessageBox "You do not have enough gold to make a donation." "OK"
	Return
endif

if ( QuestionState == 0 )
	MessageBox "Would you like to make a donation of %.0f and receive a blessing?" donation "Yes" "No"
	set QuestionState to 10
endif

;Ask second question 
if ( QuestionState == 10 )

	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		MessageBox "What blessing do you ask for?" "Cure Disease" "Cure Blight" "Cure Poison" "Lady's Grace" "Almsivi Restoration"
		set QuestionState to 20
	elseif ( button == 1 )
		set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	Return

endif

;perform cure or give message
if ( QuestionState == 20 )
	
	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetCommonDisease == 1 )
			Cast "Cure Common Disease Other" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox "You are not afflicted with a common disease." "OK"
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif
	
	if ( button == 1 )
		if ( Player->GetBlightDisease == 1 )
			Cast "Cure Blight Disease" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox "You are not afflicted with a blight disease." "OK"
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 2 )
		if ( Player->GetEffect sEffectPoison == 1 )				;check for poison effect on player
			Cast "Cure Poison Touch" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox "You are not poisoned." "OK"
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif
	
	if ( button == 3 )
		Cast "Lady's Grace shrine" Player					;Fortify Endurance 5
		if ( donation == 35 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
		elseif ( donation == 5 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 4 )
		Cast "Almsivi Restoration" Player					;restore eight attributes
		Cast "Almsivi Restore Fighter" Player					;restore eight fighter skills
		Cast "Almsivi Restore Mage" Player					;restore eight mage skills
		Cast "Almsivi Restore Stealth" Player					;restore eight stealth skills
		Cast "Almsivi Restore Other" Player					;restore three other skills
		if ( donation == 35 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
		elseif ( donation == 5 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

endif

end

begin AB_Spiders_s

Short DoOnce

if ( GetHealth >= 1 )
	return
endif

if ( DoOnce == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( Random100 < 60 )
	PlaceAtMe "AB_Fau_SpiderParasolBby" 1 16 2
endif

if ( Random100 < 30 )
	PlaceAtMe "AB_Fau_SpiderParasolBby" 1 16 3
endif

Set DoOnce to 1

end

Begin AB_StaffCraftResin_s

short button
short QuestionState


if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	if ( QuestionState == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle 1
		Return
	endif
endif

if ( QuestionState == 0 )
	MessageBox "Would you like to craft or recharge a resin staff?" "Craft" "Recharge"
	set QuestionState to 10
endif

if ( QuestionState == 10 )

	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount "AB_IngFlor_TelvanniResin" < 10 )
			set QuestionState to 0
			MessageBox "You do not have enough Telvanni resin to craft a staff" "Ok"
		elseif ( Player->GetItemCount "Misc_SoulGem_Greater" < 2 )
			set QuestionState to 0
			MessageBox "You do not have enough greater soul gems to craft a staff" "Ok"
		else
			PlayGroup Idle2 1
			Player->RemoveItem "AB_IngFlor_TelvanniResin" 10
			Player->RemoveItem "Misc_SoulGem_Greater" 2
			PlaySound "Item Weapon Blunt Down"
			MessageBox "You successfully crafted a resin staff. What enchantment would you like to place on it?" "Devouring" "Incineration" "Unholy Terror"
			set QuestionState to 20
		endif
	elseif ( button == 1 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount "AB_w_ResinStaffDevouring" == 0 )
			if ( Player->GetItemCount "AB_w_ResinStaffFire" == 0 )
				if ( Player->GetItemCount "AB_w_ResinStaffTerror" == 0 )
					MessageBox "You do not have a resin staff to recharge." "Ok"
					set QuestionState to 0
					Return
				endif
			endif
		endif
		if ( Player->GetItemCount "AB_w_ResinStaffDevouring" > 0 )
			PlaySound "enchant success"
			PlaySound "Item Weapon Blunt Down"
			Player->RemoveItem "AB_w_ResinStaffDevouring" 1
			Player->AddItem "AB_w_ResinStaffDevouring" 1
			MessageBox "You have recharged your Resin Staff of Devouring"
			set QuestionState to 0
		endif
		if ( Player->GetItemCount "AB_w_ResinStaffTerror" > 0 )
			PlaySound "enchant success"
			PlaySound "Item Weapon Blunt Down"
			Player->RemoveItem "AB_w_ResinStaffTerror" 1
			Player->AddItem "AB_w_ResinStaffTerror" 1
			MessageBox "You have recharged your Resin Staff of Unholy Terror"
			set QuestionState to 0
		endif
		if ( Player->GetItemCount "AB_w_ResinStaffFire" > 0 )
			PlaySound "enchant success"
			PlaySound "Item Weapon Blunt Down"
			Player->RemoveItem "AB_w_ResinStaffFire" 1
			Player->AddItem "AB_w_ResinStaffFire" 1
			MessageBox "You have recharged your Resin Staff of Incineration"
			set QuestionState to 0
		endif
	endif

	Return

endif

if ( QuestionState == 20 )

	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		PlaySound "enchant success"
		PlaySound "Item Weapon Blunt Down"
		Player->AddItem "AB_w_ResinStaffDevouring" 1
		PlayGroup Idle 1
		set QuestionState to 0
	elseif ( button == 1 )
		PlaySound "enchant success"
		PlaySound "Item Weapon Blunt Down"
		Player->AddItem "AB_w_ResinStaffFire" 1
		PlayGroup Idle 1
		set QuestionState to 0
	elseif ( button == 2 )
		PlaySound "enchant success"
		PlaySound "Item Weapon Blunt Down"
		Player->AddItem "AB_w_ResinStaffTerror" 1
		PlayGroup Idle 1
		set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	Return

endif


End

Begin AB_TelRootRetracting_s

Short animStart
Short stayOpen
Float timer

; Root retracts when the player approaches and opens back up when the player is further away.

; Idle Closed
; Idle2 Opening
; Idle3 Open
; Idle4 Closing

; this is where you would add a requirement to allow the player to pass through
; if ( ConditionIsNotMet )
; 	  Return
; endif


if ( CellChanged )
	; Close the roots
	set stayOpen to 0
	PlayGroup Idle
endif

if ( stayOpen == 1 )
	PlayGroup Idle3
elseif ( stayOpen == -1 )
	LoopGroup Idle4 0 1
	set stayOpen to 0
endif

if ( GetDistance "player" <= 900 )
	if ( stayOpen == 0 )
		; slightly randomize the start time if multiple roots are used
		set animStart to random 20
		set timer to animStart / 10
		set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
		if ( timer < 0 )
			LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
			set stayOpen to 1
			Return
		endif
	endif
else
	if ( stayOpen == 1 )
		set stayOpen to -1
		Return
	endif
endif


End

Begin AB_VelSwitchEXAMPLE_s

float timer
short state
short doorState

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	
	if ( doorState == 0 )
		PlaySound "Open Lock"
		"AB_In_VelPitHidDoorEXAMPLE"->Playsound3DVP "Stone Door Open 1" 1.0 1.0
		"AB_In_VelPitHidDoorEXAMPLE"->LoopGroup Idle 0 1
		set doorState to 10
		set state to 10
	endif
endif

if ( State >= 10 )
	
	set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
		
	;set back to start
	if ( timer > 22 )
			
			set State to 0		;can now press button again
			set doorState to 0
			set timer to 0

	;move gate down (210 units)
	elseif ( timer > 18 )

			;use state so sound only plays once			
			if ( State == 10 )
				"AB_In_VelPitHidDoorEXAMPLE"->LoopGroup Idle3 0 1
				"AB_In_VelPitHidDoorEXAMPLE"->Playsound3DVP "Stone Door Open 1" 1.0 1.0
				Set State to 20
			endif

	endif
endif

if ( doorState == 0 )
	"AB_In_VelPitHidDoorEXAMPLE"->LoopGroup Idle4 0 1
endif



end

begin AB_Ventworm_s

; Idle = Idle loop
; Idle2 = Closing
; Idle3 = Closed
; Idle4 = Opening
; Death1 = Looted

float timer
short looted
short close

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
    set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
    return
endif

; close when player gets too close
if ( close == 1 )
    ; MessageBox "Player is too close, do [LoopGroup Idle2 0 1]"
    LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
    set timer to 10
    set close to 2
    return
endif

; open when player is far away
if ( GetDistance Player >= 250 )
    if ( close > 0 )
        ; MessageBox "Far Enough Away, do [LoopGroup Idle4 0 1]"
        LoopGroup Idle4 0 1
        set close to 0
    endif
    if ( close < 0 )
        ; MessageBox "Finished Opening, do [PlayGroup Idle]"
        PlayGroup Idle
        set close to -1
    endif
    return
endif

if ( close == 0 )
    set close to 1
endif

end

begin AB_WebExplosion_s

float timepassed

DontSaveObject

If (MenuMode==1)
	Return
endif

if ( timepassed=0 )
	PlayGroup Idle 1
endif

Set timepassed to (timepassed + GetSecondsPassed)

If ( timepassed < 2 )
	return
elseif ( timepassed > 4 )
	setdelete 1
elseif ( timepassed >= 2 )
	disable
endif

end

Begin AB_WebTrap_s

Float Timer
Short State

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	MessageBox "You clear the web."
	PlaySound "scribLEFT"
	Set State to 2
endif

if ( State == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance player < 100 )
		PlaySound "ancestor ghost moan"
		PlaceAtPC "AB_Fx_WebExplosion" 1 180 0
		PlaceAtPC "AB_Fau_SpiderParasolBby" 1 32 1
		PlaceAtPC "AB_Fau_SpiderParasolBby" 1 32 2
		Cast "AB_sp_WebParalyze" Player
		Set State to 1
	endif
elseif ( State == 1 )
	set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	if ( timer > 1 )
		if ( Player->GetSpellEffects "AB_sp_WebParalyze" == 1 )
			Return
		else
			Set State to 2
		endif
	endif
elseif ( State == 2 )
	Disable
endif
	

End
